text: @LBC @ianpaynesport @CWhittaker_MP Nah, racism in it’s finest! Lmao literally last week coming back from work I was asked if COVID19 still exists because I was wearing a mask  🤦‍♀️ these people act like COVID19 is a myth... I live predominantly white area so if a lockdown happens in my area what would he say? 🤔
